title: Document HuggingFace provider usage in README and configuration guide
description:
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** documentation on using HuggingFace models
**So that** I can configure and use HuggingFace providers effectively

**Context:**
After implementing HuggingFace support, users need clear documentation on:
- How to get a HuggingFace API token
- How to configure HuggingFace models
- Which models are supported/recommended
- Example configurations
- Troubleshooting common issues

**Technical Notes:**
- README.md - Add HuggingFace to supported providers list
- docs/configuration.md - Add HuggingFace section
- examples/config.yaml - Add HuggingFace example profile
- Link to HuggingFace Hub: https://huggingface.co/models

**Acceptance Criteria:**

Given I read README.md
When I check the providers section
Then HuggingFace is listed with brief description

Given I read the configuration guide
When I check the HuggingFace section
Then I see step-by-step setup instructions

Given I check example configs
When I review examples/config.yaml
Then HuggingFace profile examples are included

**Testing Considerations:**
- Verify all links work
- Test example configurations
- Ensure code blocks have correct syntax

**Implementation Hints:**
Add HuggingFace to README providers list, create configuration guide section with setup steps and model recommendations, add example YAML configs.

Files to modify:
- README.md
- docs/configuration.md
- examples/config.yaml

Dependencies: SOUL-121, SOUL-122, SOUL-123
